A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really\, really BAD movie. This is a huge slap in the face to Star Wars fans. It has very little continuity with the original films or The Force Awakens. The plot is boring and riddled with holes. The actors do their best\, but you have to wonder if they were shaking their heads after delivering their lines. It is rightly called The Last Jedi because it is unclear if the franchise can continue after this travesty.
